words.definition: To make a discussion run smoothly.

example.en: He will facilitate the panel discussion.

words.definition: The role of guiding and managing a discussion.

example.en: Good moderation ensures everyone has a voice.
example.ar: الإدارة الجيدة تضمن للجميع حق الكلام.

example.en: Try to engage all attendees in the discussion.
example.ar: حاول إشراك جميع الحاضرين في النقاش.

words.definition: A general agreement reached by a group.
words.arabic_definition: اتفاق عام يتم التوصل إليه من قبل مجموعة.

example.en: The team worked hard to reach a consensus.
example.ar: عمل الفريق بجد للوصول إلى توافق.

words.definition: To repeat or restate a point for emphasis.

example.en: He reiterated the importance of teamwork.
example.ar: أعاد التأكيد على أهمية العمل الجماعي.

words.definition: To postpone a decision or discussion.

example.en: We decided to defer the final decision.
He articulated his point of view effectively.
She gave a diplomatic reply to the challenging question.

words.definition: To make peace between differing parties.

example.en: He tried to conciliate between the departments.

words.definition: To help resolve a dispute between parties.
words.arabic_definition: المساعدة على حل نزاع بين الأطراف.

example.en: He acted as a mediator between the teams.
